member.name: T:CsQuery.Mvc.CsQueryController
member.summary: An MVC controller providing access to a CQ object created from the HTML output of an MVC page.

member.name: T:CsQuery.Mvc.ICsQueryController
member.summary: An interface that identfies a controller as a target for CsQuery HTML processing

member.name: P:CsQuery.Mvc.ICsQueryController.Doc
member.summary: The CsQuery representation of the HTML before rendering.

member.name: P:CsQuery.Mvc.CsQueryController.Doc
member.summary: The CsQuery representation of the HTML before rendering.

member.name: T:CsQuery.Mvc.CsQueryView
member.summary:
A custom view that provides access to a CQ object of the html before it is output. When used as the view engine for a controller marked with ICsQueryController, it will populate the one property of that interface "Dom" with a CQ object representing the final HTML for this view, and then call for the following methods:
void Cq_Start() // called for any action first
void Cq_Action() // called for a specfic action
void Cq_End() // called for any action last
void Cq_PartialViewName() // called whenever the partial view // that matches either the file name
void Cq_Action_PartialViewName() // caled whenever the matching partial view is // rendered just for this action.

true to run view start pages.
true if this object is partial.

member.summary: Return true if the reflected method appears to be a CsQuery target method.

member.returns: true the method has a CQ method signature, false if not

member.name: T:CsQuery.Mvc.CsQueryViewEngine`1
member.summary: Custom implementation of RazorViewEngine to support CsQuery processing.
member.typeparam: A type defining a CsQuery layout controller, which can contain Cq_Start() and Cq_End() methods that will be called for all pages.

member.name: M:CsQuery.Mvc.CsQueryViewEngine`1.CreateView(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a view by using the specified controller context and the paths of the view and master view, and invokes methods on a layout controller identified by the generic type of the class.
member.param: The path to the master view.
